text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchtruckerey zu Bern und folgende Bücher in gar geringem Preiß zu haben, als: 1. <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. H Ringieri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>CX. Conciones de Ccena Dominic.</TITLE> <VOLUME>3. Vol.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1680</YEAR>. das Eremplar in albo achthalben <PRIZE>bz.</PRIZE></BIBL> 2. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rissenii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Summa Theolog.</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1703</YEAR>. † <PRIZE>10. Batzen,</PRIZE> und auff Schreib-papier <PRIZE>14. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 3. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rodolphi</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Compend. Theol. Christ</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern</PLACE><YEAR>1713</YEAR>. † <PRIZE>8 Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 4. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Carechetischer Leuchter und Rauchwerck, d. i. Erklärung und Gebatt über den Heydelbergischen Catechismum,</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern,</PLACE> <YEAR>1711</YEAR>. mit dem Kupffer-Btatt haltet <PRIZE>15. und ein halben Bogen,</PRIZE> † <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 5. <BIBL><TITLE>Biblia Piscatoris</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Rein,</PLACE> † <PRIZE>15. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 6. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seelmatters</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Ewig- vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegrundete unüberwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinderen GOttes,</TITLE> gründlich vorgestellt über die Worte des 125. Pfalms 9. 1. <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1704</YEAR>. † <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":16,"explanation":"The primary issues were widespread character encoding errors (mapping sequences like '\\u221a\\u00fc' and '\\u221a\\u00baber' to correct German characters 'ü', 'ß', 'ä', and the price marker '†'). Structural fixes included correcting three misspelled closing tags (<PRIZEL> and <PRICE> were replaced with <PRIZE>) and removing two instances of erroneously applied <FORMAT> tags used to wrap the Psalm citation ('9. 1.') in item 6."}

Conciones de Ccena Dominic.</TITLE> <VOLUME>3. Vol.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1680</YEAR>. das Eremplar in albo achthalben <PRIZE>bz.</PRIZE></BIBL> 2. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rissenii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Summa Theolog.</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1703</YEAR>. † <PRIZE>10. Batzen,</PRIZE> und auff Schreib-papier <PRIZE>14. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 3. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rodolphi</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Compend. Theol. Christ</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern</PLACE><YEAR>1713</YEAR>. † <PRIZE>8 Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 4. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Carechetischer Leuchter und Rauchwerck, d. i. Erklärung und Gebatt über den Heydelbergischen Catechismum,</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern,</PLACE> <YEAR>1711</YEAR>. mit dem Kupffer-Btatt haltet <PRIZE>15. und ein halben Bogen,</PRIZE> † <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 5. <BIBL><TITLE>Biblia Piscatoris</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Rein,</PLACE> † <PRIZE>15. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 6. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seelmatters</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Ewig- vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegrundete unüberwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinderen GOttes,</TITLE> gründlich vorgestellt über die Worte des 125. Pfalms 9. 1. <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1704</YEAR>. † <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation: The primary issues were widespread character encoding errors (mapping sequences like '\u221a\u00fc' and '\u221a\u00baber' to correct German characters 'ü', 'ß', 'ä', and the price marker '†'). Structural fixes included correcting three misspelled closing tags (<PRIZEL> and <PRICE> were replaced with <PRIZE>) and removing two instances of erroneously applied <FORMAT> tags used to wrap the Psalm citation ('9. 1.') in item 6.
